thread.title: Sthanney Lopes
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Sthanney Lopes

author: Sthanney Lopes
title: Sthanney Lopes
text: I did 6 more purchases unfortunately one of the purchases was waiting for 140 days ... not because of banggood ... but by the correspondence agency of my country that unfortunately did not deliver my products ... it took me few minutes to solve everything with the Banggood and will be resent. Thank you so much for an excellent service!
